metadata.synopsis: During combat, the orthon escalates to phase two (intensifying his attacks and changing up his tactics). This is prompted by:- killing a certain number of minions- lowering his HP a certain amount- surviving for a certain number of combat rounds
metadata.how_to_trigger: Engage in combat with the Orthon. Survive X number of rounds/kill X number of merregons/lower the Orthon's HP by X

0.speaker: Yurgir
0.text: Bravo - that almost stung. Perhaps I'll make a merregon of you, once you're dead.
0.context: NodeContext: Pronuncation: mer-eh-gone. Taunting, during combat. The player has injured the Orthon, who responds by changing up his tactics after this utterance.

1.speaker: Yurgir
1.text: Had your fill of my merregons yet? I'm right here, if you dare.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Triggers during combat after multiple merregon opponents are killedNodeContext: Pronuncation: mer-eh-gone. Taunting, during combat. The player has killed several of his merregon followers.

2.speaker: Yurgir
2.text: Fight's gotten stale, little rabbit. Stop embarrassing yourself - let me end this.
2.context: NodeContext: Taunting. Wants to bring the fight to a swift resolution.
